Secrets of Egypt & the Nile | Ama Waterways | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Secrets of Egypt & The Nile 11 Nights | Cairo roundtrip Save $1,600* per couple! Valid for select 2026 sailings Deal Details Travel Dates Jan - Jun 26: Aug - Dec 26 Sale Ends Dec 31, 2025 Priced From $10,089 per person Enquire Now Save $1,600* per couple! Valid for select 2026 sailings Description Discover the timeless wonders of Egypt on an unforgettable 11-night journey combining land exploration and a luxurious Nile River cruise. Led by expert Egyptologists, stand in awe before the legendary Pyramids of Giza and the mysterious Sphinx, explore the treasures of the Grand Egyptian Museum, and venture deep into the fabled Valley of the Kings and Queens. Along the way, enjoy exclusive, once-in-a-lifetime experiences—such as a private lunch at the opulent Abdeen Presidential Palace. From ancient monuments to hidden gems, this immersive adventure through Egypt will awaken your sense of wonder and leave you with memories to last a lifetime. Pricing 11 Nights in a Fixed Window (Acacia Deck Cat E) From $10,089* per person, twin share 11 Nights in a French Balcony (Lotus Deck Cat CB) From $12,485* per person, twin share Based on 8 June 26 departure Inclusions Arrival airport transfer 3 nights at the 5-star Four Seasons Cairo at the First Residence in a Superior room, including daily breakfast and complimentary Wi-Fi The services of a dedicated Cruise Manager throughout your entire 11-night journey Welcome Reception and Dinner Full-day Cairo tour with visits to Egyptian Museum: Home to King Tut’s treasures and a walking tour in Old Cairo 7-night river cruise in elegantly appointed accommodations Fine dining with a variety of choices, including The Chef’s Table specialty restaurant Wine, beer and soft drinks included during lunch and dinner Welcome Cocktail, Welcome Dinner, Captain’s Cocktail and Gala Dinner Sip & Sail cocktail hour Visit the ancient sites of Memphis, including the Pyramids of Giza, the Great Sphinx and Saqqara Museum and lunch at the historic Mena House Hotel Nightly entertainment including a belly dance show, Galabeya Party and Darawish Show A variety of small group guided shore excursions Visit to the outdoor Luxor Market and visit a Paprus shop and learn the history of this art from Complementary Wi-Fi One night at the Four Seasons Cairo at the First Residence in a Superior room with breakfast Exclusive private tour of the Abdeen Presidential Palace with special farewell lunch at the palace Departure airport transfer All port charges and Gratuities Itinerary Day 1 Cairo Day 2 Cairo Day 3 Cairo Day 4 Cairo - Luxor Day 5 Luxor Day 6 Edfu Day 7 Aswan Day 8 Aswan - Kom Ombo Day 9 Luxor Day 10 Luxor - Qena - Luxor Day 11 Luxor - Cairo Terms & Conditions Airfares & Transfers are additional. Pricing is correct as of 05 November 2025, is subject to change and availability at time of booking. Pricing includes savings amount. All rates cruise-only, based on double occupancy in an entry level stateroom, and include port charges and gratuities. Rates reflect savings up to $4,000 per stateroom, based on double occupancy (solo travellers receive half); actual savings vary by itinerary and sailing date. Offer applies to select 2025 and 2026 sailings and is valid on new FIT and Group reservations made by December 31, 2025. Combinable with Combination Cruise Savings, Loyalty Benefits, and the Future Cruise Benefit Program. Tour Operators are eligible; additional restrictions may apply. Not combinable with other promotions or discounts. Offer is capacity-controlled, subject to availability, and may be changed or withdrawn without notice. Stateroom upgrades, optional land packages, visas, airfares, and gratuities are additional. AmaWaterways reserves the right to correct errors or omissions Experience the world differently.
